meaning_str.bing:
n. 工资；薪水
v. 付费；偿还；交纳；付酬
adj. 需付费的；含贵重矿物的；矿藏丰富的；有关支付的
网络. 付款；付钱；付出

需付费的；含贵重矿物的；矿藏丰富的；有关支付的

支付；偿还；交纳；给予（注意、尊重等）；承担（后果、代价）；受到（惩罚、奖励）；报答；赢利；付代价
薪水；报酬；薪资；工资；酬劳；收入；待遇；薪酬；工钱
需付费的；有关支付的；矿藏丰富的；含贵重矿物的

1.en: He told me that if I were willing, the airline would pay me a handsome sum to compensate for the inconvenience.
1.cn: 他说如果我愿意的话，航空公司会对其对我造成的不便作出一笔数目可观的赔偿。

2.en: Natalie and I were discussing how we'd pay for the children's education before she got pregnant.
2.cn: Natalie和我在怀孕前就讨论过如何为孩子的教育支付费用。

3.en: If I pay all my debts, I shall have no money left.
3.cn: 如果我还清了所有的债，就一文钱不剩了。

0.en: Speaking of truth, I need you to pay Sandra for the seminar.
0.cn: 说到实话，你们得向桑德拉支付本次座谈会的费用。

1.en: Through developing mobile payment, we can now use apps to pay in nearly all the situations, even to make an appointment with the doctors.
1.cn: 通过不断发展的移动支付方式，我们现在能用手机应用软件在几乎任何情境下支付，甚至能预约医生。

2.en: We? I wondered if Edith might like to come. Keep me company. I'll pay.
2.cn: 我们？伊迪丝也许也想去，跟我作伴。我会支付费用的。

3.en: As such, he bears responsibility for all your infractions and must pay all fines.
3.cn: 所以，他对你的违规行为负有全责，并必须支付罚款。

4.en: I've been wiped out. I'll be lucky if I can pay my kid's tuition, if I make it out of here.
4.cn: 我赔了个精光，支付孩子的学费都吃力就算能活着出去。

5.en: It would help around 28 million Americans from all walks of life pay the bills provide for their kids, and spend that money at local businesses.
5.cn: 这将帮助全美2800万人民有能力支付日常支出，抚养孩子并在当地消费。

6.en: And I've done what I can on my own by requiring federal contractors to pay their workers at least ten-ten an hour.
6.cn: 我已经做了我能做得事情，要求联邦的承包商支付给他们员工的工资最少是每小时$10.10。

7.en: Dear Mr. Pig, please pay your telephone bill. Oh. What's a bill? It sounds very boring. Bills are very boring.
7.cn: 亲爱的猪先生，请你支付你的电话账单。噢天啊！什么是账单啊？它听上去非常的无聊。账单确实是非常的无聊。

8.en: I had to cut my losses so that my company, Bridgewater, was left with one employee, me. I was so broke, I had to borrow $4000, from my dad to pay my bills. But even worse was having to let go the people I cared so much about.
8.cn: 为了减少损失，我的公司Bridgewater，只剩下了一个员工就是我自己。我彻底破产，被迫向我父亲借了4000美金支付我的账单。更痛苦的是放弃那些我曾经非常在乎的人。

9.cn: 我们为什么要用钱打发你？

11.en: You work hard, you pay your taxes…

12.en: Did he pay you back? No, but he will.
12.cn: 他把钱还给你了吗？没有，不过他会还的。

13.en: Don't pay any attention to him. Manny.

14.en: Exactly. You could pay off your mortgage.
14.cn: 没错 你可以用它来还房贷。

15.en: Perhaps it is time I pay them a visit. No.
15.cn: 我是不是该会会他们。糟糕。

16.en: Here. Take some. Pay me back when you can.
16.cn: 来吧，拿一些，等你有钱了再还我。

17.en: How much can that pay? Every little bit helps.
17.cn: 那能挣多少钱？聚沙成塔。

18.en: So you're never actually going to pay me back?

19.en: I will take your kindness, and pay it forward.
19.cn: 我感谢你的善良，我要报答你。
